Package task5.impl

Class QueueBrokerImpl

java.lang.Object
task5.QueueBroker
task5.impl.QueueBrokerImpl
public final class QueueBrokerImpl extends QueueBroker
An implementation of the QueueBroker abstract working on top of a Broker.

  • Method Details

    • bind

      public void bind(int port, QueueBroker.AcceptListener listener)
      Description copied from class: QueueBroker
      Binds to a given port and starts listening for incoming connections. This method has to be called before any incoming connections can be accepted.
      The method will return immediately and call the QueueBroker.AcceptListener.accepted(MessageQueue) when a connection is established.
      Specified by:
      bind in class QueueBroker
      Parameters:
      port - the port to bind and listen for incoming connections.
      listener - the listener to handle newly accepted connections.

    • unbind

      public void unbind(int port)
      Description copied from class: QueueBroker
      Stops listening on the given port and unbinds any connections associated with it.
      Specified by:
      unbind in class QueueBroker
      Parameters:
      port - the port to unbind.

    • connect

      public void connect(String host, int port, QueueBroker.ConnectListener listener)
      Description copied from class: QueueBroker
      Connects to a remote host on the given port and establishes a message queue. The host must have a QueueBroker already bound to the given port to accept the connection.
      This method is non-blocking and will return immediately, triggering the QueueBroker.ConnectListener.connected(MessageQueue) upon success.
      Specified by:
      connect in class QueueBroker
      Parameters:
      host - the remote host to connect to.
      port - the port to connect to.
      listener - the listener to handle the connection event.
